f.description: Shortcut for `format`. Specify `jpg`, `webp`, or `png` to convert formats. By default, no conversion will take place.

format.description: Specify `jpg`, `webp`, or `png` to convert formats. By default, no conversion will take place.

h.description: Shortcut for `height`. Specify a number to downsize the image width to (in pixels). Width will scale automatically. Won’t upscale image. If `height` and `width` are specified, width takes priority.

height.description: Specify a number to downsize the image width to (in pixels). Width will scale automatically. Won’t upscale image. If `height` and `width` are specified, width takes priority.

inline.description: Set to `?inline` or `?inline=true` to return SVG markup for SVG files, or base64 encoding for other files.

q.description: Shortcut for `quality`. Specify a number, `1`–`100`, to reduce the image’s quality and filesize.

quality.description: Specify a number, `1`–`100`, to reduce the image’s quality and filesize.

skip.description: Set to `?skip` or `?skip=true` to bypass resizing & optimization entirely. Useful for problem images.

svg.description: Alias of `svgo`. Override SVGO default settings.

w.description: Shortcut for `width`. Specify a number to downsize the image width to (in pixels). Height will scale automatically. Won’t upscale image. Ignored for SVG.

width.description: Specify a number to downsize the image width to (in pixels). Height will scale automatically. Won’t upscale image. Ignored for SVG.
